content: I'd like to take ____ of this opportunity to thank all of you for your efforts.

correct: to stop the child to cry
ans: to keep the child from crying

content: He thought he could talk Mr. Robinson ____ buying some expensive equipment.

correct: to be caused by rapid burning
causing its burning to be rapid
